I currently work as Postdoctoral Researcher in Statistics at the [School of Mathematics and Statistics](https://www.ucd.ie/mathstat/), University College Dublin and I am affiliated with [Insight SFI Research Centre for Data Analytics](https://www.insight-centre.org). I am a member of [VistaMilk](https://www.vistamilk.ie), a SFI Research Centre aiming to transform Irish dairy sector into a global leader in sustainable Agri-Tech. <br>
